section.h1:
HMRC Internet Filing
Corporation Tax Return (2014)

dl.dt: XML Schema documentation for:

section.p: If you are reading this on a computer, then there are a lot of places that you can click to be taken to a definition. These are coloured blue and will jump you to the relevant part of this document.
Each schema has a summary section, showing information about the Schema, such as its namespace, version, schema location, and a list of the globals defined in the schema.

Structures are represented as a textual table of properties. These can be restrictions on the information allowed in that part of the structure, or information about the structure, such as a description of purpose.

Before the Index is a section summarising all of the rules defined on elements of this [output stream/schema]. This lists the error code, or rule identifier and descriptions of the rules, along with links to the structure section on which they appear.

Pattern validation on a box element is a way to restrict what entries are valid for that box. Patterns only apply to text-based elements (strings, numbers or dates) where a certain format is required. When multiple patterns are specified on the same box, then an entry in that box matching any one of those patterns will be allowed. When a box has a type restricted by a pattern, as well as a pattern of its own, only entries matching both patterns are allowed. The official definition of how patterns are used is available at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#rf-pattern.
Useful examples can be found at https://www.w3schools.com/xml/schema_facets.asp.

tr.td: Company name as registered at companies house
description: There must be a Key element in the Irheader whose Type attribute is UTR and whose content is the same as the entry in [3].
There must be a Key element in the IRheader whose Type attribute is UTR and matches the tax reference in Box 3
Mae’n rhaid bod yna elfen Allweddol yn yr IRheader sydd â’i briodoledd Teip yn UTR ac sy'n cyd-fynd â’r cyfeirnod treth ym Mlwch 3

dl.dt: Child Elements:

tr.td: description: If [N009] is present then [35] must be on or after '2050-04-01'
Boxes 5, 6, 7 and 8 can only be completed if the To date in Box 35 is on or after 01 April 2050
description: [125] should be present if [5] is present but all of [6], [7] and [8] are absent
Box 125 must be completed if Box 5 is completed and Boxes 6, 7 and 8 are not completed
description: If [7] is present then [6] must be present
If Box 7 is completed then Box 6 must be completed
description: [125] should be present if [8] is present
Box 125 must be completed if Box 8 is completed

dl.dt: Child Elements:

tr.td: description: [35] should be less than 12 months after [30]
The return period covered in Boxes 30 and 35 must not be longer than 12 months
Ni ddylai cyfnod y ffurflen dreth a gwmpasir ym Mlychau 30 a 35 fod yn hirach na 12 mis
Date of the beginning of the company's return for period
description: [30] cannot be later than yesterday
The return period From date in Box 30 must not be later than yesterday
Ni ddylai dyddiad I cyfnod y ffurflen dreth ym Mlwch 30 fod yn hwyrach na ddoe
Date of the end of the company's return for the period
description: [35] should be on or after [30]
The return period To date in Box 35 must be on or after the return period From date in Box 30
Mae’n rhaid i ddyddiad I cyfnod y ffurflen dreth ym Mlwch 35 fod ar neu ar ôl dyddiad O cyfnod y ffurflen dreth ym Mlwch 30
description: [35] cannot be later than today unless [4] = 3.
The return period To date cannot be later than today unless the type of company is 3 (Company in liquidation which is chargeable at the main rate following the first period after liquidation)
Ni all dyddiad I cyfnod y ffurflen dreth fod yn hwyrach na heddiw heblaw bod y math o gwmni yn 3 (Cwmni mewn datodiad sy'n drethadwy ar y brif gyfradd yn dilyn y cyfnod cyntaf ar ôl datodiad)

description: [140] must equal 'yes' if [65] equals 'yes' and [N003] does not equal 'amended'.
If the return type is New then Box 140 must be completed if Box 65 is completed

dl.dt: Child Elements:

tr.td: Boxes 70 and 75 cannot both be completed

dl.dt: Child Elements:

tr.td: description: If [90A] is absent or not "PDF accounts attached with explanation", then there must be no instance of [N106] with a type attribute of 'accounts'.
You can only provide a set of PDF accounts if you also complete the 'No accounts reason' with the value of 'PDF accounts attached with explanation'
Gallwch dim ond rhoi set o gyfrifon PDF os ydych hefyd yn cwblhau'r 'Rheswm dim cyfrifon' gyda'r gwerth 'Cyfrifon PDF sydd wedi eu hatodi ynghyd ag esboniad'
description: If [90A] is absent then the Accounts child of [N107] must be present.
You must provide a set of iXBRL accounts if the 'No accounts reason' is absent
Mae'n rhaid i chi gyflwyno set o gyfrifon iXBRL os yw'r 'Rheswm dim cyfrifon' yn absennol
description: If [90A] is absent or "PDF accounts attached with explanation", then exactly one of [80A] or [85A] must be present.
If 'No accounts reason' is absent or has been completed with 'PDF accounts attached with explanation' you must complete either 'This period accounts' or 'Different period accounts'

Os yw'r 'Rheswm dim cyfrifon' yn absennol neu wedi ei gwblhau gyda 'Cyfrifon PDF sydd wedi eu hatodi ynghyd ag esboniad' rhaid i chi gwblhau naill ai 'Cyfrifon y cyfnod hwn' neu 'Cyfrifon cyfnod gwahanol'
description: If [90A] is present and not "PDF accounts attached with explanation", then neither [80A] nor [85A] may be present.
If 'No accounts reason' is present and has not been completed with 'PDF accounts attached with Explanation' you must not complete either 'This period accounts' or 'Different period accounts'

Os yw ''Rheswm dim cyfrifon' yn bresennol ac nid yw wedi ei gwblhau gyda 'Cyfrifon PDF sydd wedi eu hatodi ynghyd ag esboniad' ni ddylech gwblhau naill ai 'Cyfrifon y cyfnod hwn' neu 'Cyfrifon cyfnod gwahanol'
I attach accounts for the period to which this return relates
I attach accounts for a different period
PoA differs from AP-a/cs with sep rtn
description: If [90A] is present, then there must be no Accounts element as a child of [N107]
iXBRL Accounts are attached so 'No accounts reason' must not be completed
Mae Cyfrifon iXBRL wedi eu hatodi felly ni ddylid cwblhau 'Rheswm dim cyfrifon'
description: If [90A] equals 'Amendment - a/cs already submitted' then [N003] must equal 'amended'.
Amendment - accounts already submitted' cannot be used if the return type is New
Diwygiad - ni ellid defnyddio cyfrifon sydd eisoes wedi eu cyflwyno os yw'r math o ffurflen dreth yn Newydd
description: If [90A] is "PDF accounts attached with explanation", then there must be at least one instance of [N106] with type = 'accounts'.
You must provide a set of PDF Accounts if 'No accounts reason' is completed with 'PDF accounts attached with explanation'
Mae'n rhaid i chi gyflwyno set o Gyfrifon PDF os yw'r 'Rheswm dim cyfrifon' wedi ei gwblhau gyda 'Cyfrifon PDF sydd wedi eu hatodi ynghyd ag esboniad'

dl.dt: Child Elements:

tr.td: description: If [90B] is absent, then there must be a Computations element as a child of [N107], or at least one instance of [N106] with type = 'computations'.
You must provide a Tax Computation with the return unless you provide a valid reason not to supply it
Mae'n rhaid i chi gyflwyno Cyfrifiant Treth gyda'r ffurflen dreth oni bai eich bod yn rhoi rheswm dilys dros beidio â'i chyflwyno
description: If [90B] is absent, then there must not be both a Computations element as a child of [N107] and any instances of [N106] with type = 'computations'.
You cannot provide both iXBRL and PDF Tax Computations with the return
Ni allwch roi iXBRL a Chyfrifiannau Treth PDF gyda'r ffurflen dreth

Computations in PDF format are attached so a reason for no Computations must not be completed
Mae Cyfrifiannau wedi eu hatodi mewn fformat PDF felly ni ddylid cwblhau rheswm ar gyfer dim Cyfrifiannau
description: If [90B] is present, then there must be no Computation element as a child of [N107]
Computations in iXBRL format are attached so a reason for no Computations must not be provided
Mae Cyfrifiannau wedi eu hatodi mewn fformat iXBRL felly ni ddylid rhoi rheswm ar gyfer dim Cyfrifiannau
description: If [90B] equals 'Amendment - comps already submitted' then [N003] must equal 'amended'.
Amendments - computations already submitted' cannot be used if the return type is New
Diwygiadau - ni ellid defnyddio cyfrifiannu sydd eisoes wedi eu cyflwyno os yw'r math o ffurflen dreth yn Newydd

description: If [LOANS-PARTICIPATOR-RATE] does not change in the period [30] to [35] inclusive: [A20] should equal [A15] at [LOANS-PARTICIPATOR-RATE] for that period, rounded to the nearest penny, with half-penny rounding upwards.

If the loans to participator rate does not change in the accounting period of the return then Box A20 must equal Box A15 multiplied by the loans to participator rate for that period. Round down for fractions less than half a penny and round up for fractions of half a penny or greater

description: If [LOANS-PARTICIPATOR-RATE] changes in the period [30] to [35] inclusive: [A20] should be at least ([A15] at the lowest value of [LOANS-PARTICIPATOR-RATE] for that period, rounded to the nearest penny, with half-penny rounding upwards).

If the loans to participator rate changes in the accounting period of the return then Box A20 must be equal to or greater than Box A15 multiplied by the lowest loans to participator rate for that period. Round down for fractions less than half a penny and round up for fractions of half a penny or greater

description: If [LOANS-PARTICIPATOR-RATE] changes in the period [30] to [35] inclusive: [A20] should be at most [A15] at the highest value of [LOANS-PARTICIPATOR-RATE] for that period, rounded to the nearest penny, with half-penny rounding upwards.

If the loans to participator rate changes in the accounting period of the return then Box A20 must be equal to or less than Box A15 multiplied by the highest loans to participator rate for that period. Round down for fractions less than half a penny and round up for fractions of half a penny or greater

description: If [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE] changes in the period [30] to [35] inclusive: let part1 = (the number of days from [30] to the end of the old rate inclusive, multiplied by [I65] and divided by number of days from [30] to [35] inclusive); let part2 = [I65] minus part1; [I70] must equal part1 at the former value of [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE] + part2 at the latter value of [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE]
To round part1: If the pence figure is equal to or greater than 50p then round part1 up, otherwise round part1 down, to the nearest whole pound.

If the ring fence supplementary charge rate changes in the accounting period of the return then Box I70 must be calculated as follows. Part1 equals the number of days from the return period From date in Box 30 to the date the rate changed multiplied by Box I65 and divided by the number of days in the accounting period of the return. If the pence figure is equal to or greater than 50p then round Part1 up otherwise round down, to the nearest whole pound. Part2 equals Box I65 minus Part1. Multiply each Part by the applicable ring fence supplementary charge rate and add together
description: If [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE] does not change in the period [30] to [35] inclusive: [I70] should equal [I65] at [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE] for that period

If the ring fence supplementary charge rate does not change in the accounting period of the return then Box I70 must equal Box I65 multiplied by the ring fence supplementary charge rate for that period

Error code: 5004
Location: /IRheader
Description: At least one key must exist
Transactional error (en): At least one key must exist in the IRHeader
Transactional error (cy): Mae'n rhaid i o leiaf un allwedd bodoli yn yr IRHeader

Error code: 5005
Location: /IRheader/Keys/Key
Description: Keys in the IR header must also exist in the GovTalk header with the same value
Transactional error (en): Keys in the GovTalkDetails do not match those in the IRheader.
Transactional error (cy): Nid yw'r allweddi yn y GovTalkDetails yn cyd-fynd â'r rheiny yn yr IRHeader.

Error code: 9001

Error code: 9819
Location: [CTI]/CalculationOfSupplementaryCharge/Tax
Description: If [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE] changes in the period [30] to [35] inclusive: let part1 = (the number of days from [30] to the end of the old rate inclusive, multiplied by [I65] and divided by number of days from [30] to [35] inclusive); let part2 = [I65] minus part1; [I70] must equal part1 at the former value of [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE] + part2 at the latter value of [RF-SUPPLEMENTARY-CHARGE-RATE]
To round part1: If the pence figure is equal to or greater than 50p then round part1 up, otherwise round part1 down, to the nearest whole pound.
Transactional error (en): If the ring fence supplementary charge rate changes in the accounting period of the return then Box I70 must be calculated as follows. Part1 equals the number of days from the return period From date in Box 30 to the date the rate changed multiplied by Box I65 and divided by the number of days in the accounting period of the return. If the pence figure is equal to or greater than 50p then round Part1 up otherwise round down, to the nearest whole pound. Part2 equals Box I65 minus Part1. Multiply each Part by the applicable ring fence supplementary charge rate and add together
